params.balancesContainerLeaf: The leaf node containing the balances container
params.balancesContainerProof: The merkle proof for the balances container to the beacon block root. This is the witness hashes concatenated together starting from the leaf node.
params.beaconBlockRoot: The root of the beacon block
The root of the beacon block
params.blockNumber: The execution layer block number to verify
params.blockNumberProof: The merkle proof for the block number against the beacon block This is the witness hashes concatenated together starting from the leaf node.

params.beaconBlockRoot: The root of the beacon block
params.firstPendingDepositSlotProof: The merkle proof for the first pending deposit's slot against the beacon block root. This is the witness hashes concatenated together starting from the leaf node.
params.slot: The beacon chain slot to verify

params.beaconBlockRoot: The root of the beacon block
params.slot: The beacon chain slot to verify
params.slotProof: The merkle proof for the slot against the beacon block root. This is the witness hashes concatenated together starting from the leaf node.

params.balanceProof: The merkle proof for the validator balance against the root. This is the witness hashes concatenated together starting from the leaf node.
params.level: The level of the balance proof, either Container or BeaconBlock
params.root: The root of the Balances container or the beacon block root
params.validatorBalanceLeaf: The leaf node containing the validator balance with three other balances
params.validatorIndex: The validator index to verify the balance for

returns.validatorBalanceGwei: The balance in Gwei of the validator at the given index

params.beaconBlockRoot: The root of the beacon block
params.pubKeyHash: The beacon chain hash of the validator public key
params.validatorPubKeyProof: The merkle proof for the validator public key to the beacon block root. This is the witness hashes concatenated together starting from the leaf node.

verifyBalancesContainer(bytes32,bytes32,.notice: Verifies the balances container against the beacon block root BeaconBlock.state.balances

verifyBlockNumber(bytes32,uint256,bytes).notice: Verifies the block number to the the beacon block root BeaconBlock.body.executionPayload.blockNumber

verifyFirstPendingDepositSlot(bytes32,ui.notice: Verifies the slot of the first pending deposit against the beacon block root BeaconBlock.state.PendingDeposits[0].slot

verifySlot(bytes32,uint256,bytes).notice: Verifies the slot number against the beacon block root. BeaconBlock.slot

verifyValidatorBalance(bytes32,bytes32,b.notice: Verifies the validator balance against the root of the Balances container or the beacon block root

verifyValidatorPubkey(bytes32,bytes32,by.notice: Verifies the validator public key against the beacon block root BeaconBlock.state.validators[validatorIndex].pubkey
